code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows stenosis at L4 and L5

observation.value: shows stenosis at L4 and L5

td.content: s:pt presents with progressive moderate stiffness, moderate leg pain, moderate low back pain and Body Aches for past 4 weeks. patient is a 40 YO male. he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 72 in, Weight 189 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, sensation: intact a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Naproxen - 250 mg po q 12h prn, and ordered Lumbar CT myelogram.

content2.Unmatched: he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol

td.content: s:M aged 41 ys c/o 2 weeks h/o moderate low back pain. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 71 in, Weight 186 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Chest = reduced inspiratory chest excursion a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:41 YO male unemployed c/o 11 days h/o moderate stiffness (not checked), moderate leg pain, moderate low back pain. o:Height 70 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, patient appears in stooped posture a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed oxycodone - 5 mg po q 4h prn.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
